details.description: Replaced margin-left with marginInlineStart for RTL-aware styling
Replaced margin-left with marginInlineStart on IconButton component

file_insights.purpose: Enable bidirectional text support and RTL language compatibility

patterns_discovered.pattern: CSS property migration to logical properties
patterns_discovered.description: Systematic replacement of physical margin properties (ml/mr) with logical properties (marginInlineStart/End)
patterns_discovered.benefit: Improves internationalization support and respects text direction

patterns_discovered.description: All styling uses Material-UI's sx prop for type-safe CSS-in-JS

gotchas_discovered.note: Straightforward refactoring with no edge cases or complications detected

approach_outcome.notes: Successfully migrated Header component to use logical CSS properties. Both instances of ml (margin-left) were correctly replaced with marginInlineStart (margin-inline-start). No conditional logic was involved; changes were direct property substitutions.

recommendations.description: Continue systematic migration of remaining components
recommendations.rationale: This component was successfully refactored; same pattern should apply to other components using ml/mr properties

recommendations.description: Verify visual layout in both LTR and RTL languages
recommendations.rationale: Logical properties should render correctly regardless of text direction, but visual testing confirms proper implementation

recommendations.description: Establish linting rules to prevent new ml/mr usage
recommendations.rationale: Once migration is complete, automate enforcement of logical properties to prevent regressions
